channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-50766|2024-08-02T22:16:47.320Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nexus%20platform%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin 3.18.0-03 and earlier allows attackers to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML.

item.title: CVE-2023-50769|2024-08-02T22:23:42.989Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nexus%20platform%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin 3.18.0-03 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-50767|2024-08-02T22:16:47.269Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nexus%20platform%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin 3.18.0-03 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML.

item.title: CVE-2023-50768|2024-08-02T22:23:42.913Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nexus%20platform%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Nexus Platform Plugin 3.18.0-03 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
